Argent Strike.name: Argent Strike
Argent Strike.flavor: Your weapon shines with silver light. When it strikes, your corona flares to revitalize an ally.
Argent Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage. Each ally within 3 squares of you can both spend a healing surge and shift 1 square as a free action. Any ally who doesnâ€™t spend a healing surge gains 10 temporary hit points.

Argent Flood.name: Argent Flood
Argent Flood.flavor: Your allies find new reserves in the silver light you unleash.
Argent Flood.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of you can either spend a healing surge or gain temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

Burgeoning Reserves.name: Burgeoning Reserves
Burgeoning Reserves.flavor: Your touch restores vitality to a fallen comrade.
Burgeoning Reserves.effect: The target can spend a healing surge, and he or she gains regeneration 5 until the end of your next turn.
Burgeoning Reserves.sustainMinor: The regeneration persists. You can sustain the regeneration only if the target is bloodied.
